price: 15 et dissipera leur ressentiment. Puis Allah, par Sa science et Sa sagesse infinies, accueillera le repentir de qui Il voudra parmi eux.
arabic: وَيُذۡهِبۡ غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayudh'hib ghayẓa qulūbihim wayatūbu al-lahu ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
